item.title: Rattling loose wire inside light column, 26th October
item.description:
Please see previously reported issue number 6865383 Wire inside column rattles loudly against metal column during windy weather. It’s extremely loud and needs to be secured as it is disturbing sleep of the surrounding neighbours. This issue has been going on for over a year. Previous report claimed to have placed plans to fix said issue but noise continues.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crayford Way, Barnes Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Still no hot water, 26th October
item.description:
This is a shamble no hot water since Thursday, can’t turn on heating and it’s so cold. My kids are freezing what is Hackney doing talking about waiting on parts to be delivered this a joke and I’m going to take this matter further.

item.title: Flytipping at two sites, very close to eachother, 26th October
item.description:
Please attend and arrange clearance of flytipping. Litter has also accumulated in the surrounding area. This road forms part of NCN12 and is a popular route amongst cyclists and walkers. 1.///lights.glow.slap 2. ///tinsel.half.pirate

item.title: Bus stop lights not working, 26th October
item.description:
On Bromley hill br1 4jU bus stop DC as no lighting on it and dangerous when you want a bus you have to put your phone light on so the drivers can see you standing at the bus stop this as been reported but no work done it TFL are wasting time to do repairs when being told you need to get in touch with TFL let them know with all the money they’re getting off the public to go into London should use it on bus stop what have been damaged or damage TFL are now bovering about the job that as been reported don’t want to know

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 94, Bromley Hill, Downham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
